attributes.action: Provide an increase of money for transport for London.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do this because it should be a huge priority as there are people such as elderly, pregnant women, disabled people, and people who struggle with respiratory system who do not have the luxury of other modes of transport who have to endure this heat , along with bus drivers cramped in their section of the bus.
attributes.background: I would like the government to increase the funding for Tfl so we can install air cooling systems on the buses which will benefit us.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government is not responsible for funding improvements to buses used by Transport for London.
